definition: The word "naß" refers to the state of being wet or damp. It is commonly used to describe the condition of something that has come into contact with water or any other liquid.

examples.german: Der Hund ist naß vom Regen.
examples.english: The dog is wet from the rain.

examples.german: Die Blumen sind naß vom Tau.
examples.english: The flowers are wet from the dew.
